changeSet.id: Added Pre Evaluated FC Specific Queries
changeSet.author: Krunal Bhavsar

column.name: id
column.valueComputed: (select case count(sql.id) when 0 then 1 ELSE max(sql.id) + 1 END from pre_evaluated_sql sql)

column.name: sql_query
column.value: select price_model.rate,international_description.content,item.* from item inner join international_description on item.id = international_description.foreign_id inner join entity_item_price_map on item.id = entity_item_price_map.item_id inner join item_price_timeline on entity_item_price_map.id = item_price_timeline.model_map_id inner join price_model on item_price_timeline.price_model_id = price_model.id where (item.id in (select item_id from item_entity_map where item_id in (select item_id from item_type_map where type_id=:categoryId) and entity_id= :entityId) or item.id in (select item_id from item_type_map where item_id in (select item.id from item where global=true and deleted=0) and type_id= :categoryId)) and item.id not in (select item_id from plan) and table_id=14 order by item.id

column.name: parent_entity_id
column.valueComputed: (select min(id) from entity where parent_id is null)

column.name: id
column.valueComputed: (select case count(p.id) when 0 then 1 ELSE max(p.id) + 1 END from pre_evaluated_sql_parameter p)

column.name: sql_query
column.value: select item_meta_field_map.item_id, meta_field_name.name, meta_field_value.string_value from meta_field_value inner join meta_field_name on meta_field_value.meta_field_name_id = meta_field_name.id inner join item_meta_field_map on item_meta_field_map.meta_field_value_id = meta_field_value.id where item_meta_field_map.item_id in (:itemIdList)

column.name: functional_description
column.value: Query to Get Meta Fields For Additional Services

column.name: parent_entity_id
column.valueComputed: (select min(id) from entity where parent_id is null)

column.name: sql_query
column.value: select invoice.id as invoice_id,invoice.user_id, base_user.entity_id,meta_field_value.string_value as account_number, meta_field_value.meta_field_name_id from invoice inner join base_user on invoice.user_id=base_user.id inner join customer on customer.user_id=invoice.user_id inner join customer_meta_field_map on customer_meta_field_map.customer_id=customer.id inner join meta_field_value on customer_meta_field_map.meta_field_value_id = meta_field_value.id where meta_field_value.meta_field_name_id in (select id from meta_field_name where LOWER(name) like '%accountnumber%') and invoice.create_datetime >= :fromDate and invoice.create_datetime < :toDate and base_user.entity_id= :entityId order by meta_field_value.string_value

column.name: functional_description
column.value: Query to get invoices id by primary account number

column.name: parent_entity_id
column.valueComputed: (select min(id) from entity where parent_id is null)

column.name: sql_query
column.value: select invoice.id as invoice_id,invoice.user_id, meta_field_value.string_value as accountpin, meta_field_value.meta_field_name_id from invoice inner join customer on customer.user_id=invoice.user_id inner join customer_meta_field_map on customer_meta_field_map.customer_id=customer.id inner join meta_field_value on customer_meta_field_map.meta_field_value_id = meta_field_value.id where meta_field_value.meta_field_name_id in (select id from meta_field_name where LOWER(name) like '%account pin%') and meta_field_value.string_value= :accountPin and invoice.create_datetime >= :fromDate and invoice.create_datetime < :toDate order by invoice.create_datetime desc

column.name: functional_description
column.value: Query To Get Invoices By AccountPin

column.name: parent_entity_id
column.valueComputed: (select min(id) from entity where parent_id is null)

column.name: sql_query
column.value: select purhase_order_id, to_char(order_date, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH:MI AM') as order_date, user_id, orl.id as order_line_id, item_id, round(quantity,2) as quantity, r from (select ROW_NUMBER() over (partition by item_id order by quantity desc) as r, ol.*, purchase_order.id as purhase_order_id, purchase_order.create_datetime as order_date, purchase_order.user_id as user_id from order_line ol inner join purchase_order on ol.order_id=purchase_order.id where purchase_order.period_id=1 and purchase_order.create_datetime >= :fromDate and purchase_order.create_datetime < :toDate) orl where orl.r <= :topCount and item_id in (:itemIdList) order by item_id, r

column.name: functional_description
column.value: Query to get Top Users Usage Report

column.name: parent_entity_id
column.valueComputed: (select min(id) from entity where parent_id is null)

column.name: sql_query
column.value: select count(*), to_char(create_datetime, 'YYYY-MM-DD') as creation_date from base_user where status_id=1 and create_datetime >= :fromDate and create_datetime <= :toDate and deleted=0 and entity_id not in (:entityIdList) and deleted=0 group by creation_date order by creation_date

column.name: parent_entity_id
column.valueComputed: (select min(id) from entity where parent_id is null)

column.name: sql_query
column.value: select count(*), to_char(last_status_change, 'YYYY-MM-DD') as cancellation_date from base_user where status_id!=1 and last_status_change > :fromDate and last_status_change <= :toDate and deleted=0 and entity_id not in (:entityIdList) and deleted=0 group by cancellation_date order by cancellation_date

column.name: functional_description
column.value: Query To Get Cancelled Customer Report

column.name: parent_entity_id
column.valueComputed: (select min(id) from entity where parent_id is null)

column.name: sql_query
column.value: select base_user.id as user_id, base_user.entity_id as entity_id, base_user.status_id as user_status, usage_pool.quantity as plan_usage, to_char(base_user.create_datetime, 'YYYY-MM-DD') as create_date, meta_field_name.name as name, meta_field_value.string_value as value, to_char(base_user.last_status_change, 'YYYY-MM-DD') as status_change_date from base_user inner join customer on base_user.id = customer.user_id inner join customer_account_info_type_timeline on customer_account_info_type_timeline.customer_id = customer.id inner join meta_field_value on meta_field_value.id = customer_account_info_type_timeline.meta_field_value_id inner join meta_field_name on meta_field_name.id = meta_field_value.meta_field_name_id LEFT OUTER JOIN customer_usage_pool_map on customer.id=customer_usage_pool_map.customer_id LEFT OUTER JOIN usage_pool on customer_usage_pool_map.usage_pool_id = usage_pool.id where LOWER(meta_field_name.name) like '%statement name 1%' or LOWER(meta_field_name.name) like '%billing email%' and customer_usage_pool_map.cycle_end_date > '1970-01-01' order by user_id, name

column.name: functional_description
column.value: Query To Get Customer Contact Information

column.name: parent_entity_id
column.valueComputed: (select min(id) from entity where parent_id is null)

column.name: sql_query
column.value: select customer.user_id, meta_field_name.name as name, meta_field_value.string_value as value from customer inner join customer_meta_field_map on customer.id=customer_meta_field_map.customer_id inner join meta_field_value on customer_meta_field_map.meta_field_value_id = meta_field_value.id inner join meta_field_name on meta_field_value.meta_field_name_id=meta_field_name.id inner join base_user on customer.user_id=base_user.id where LOWER(name) like '%primaryaccount%' order by customer.user_id

column.value: Query To Get Customer Primary Account Information

column.valueComputed: (select min(id) from entity where parent_id is null)

column.name: sql_query
column.value: select sum(amount) as total, user_id from payment where result_id in (1, 4) and is_refund=0 and method_id!= :methodId group by user_id order by user_id

column.name: functional_description
column.value: Query To Get Report For Customers Life Time Revenue

column.name: parent_entity_id
column.valueComputed: (select min(id) from entity where parent_id is null)

column.name: sql_query
column.value: select payment_information.user_id, payment_method_type.method_name from payment_information inner join payment_method_type on payment_information.payment_method_id=payment_method_type.id where user_id != 0 order by user_id

column.value: Query To Get Report For Customers Payment Methods

column.name: parent_entity_id
column.valueComputed: (select min(id) from entity where parent_id is null)

column.name: sql_query
column.value: select DISTINCT ON (user_id) user_id, amount, to_char(create_datetime, 'YYYY-MM-DD') as pay_date, payment_date from payment order by user_id, create_datetime desc

column.name: functional_description
column.value: Query To Get Customers’ Last Payment Details

column.name: parent_entity_id
column.valueComputed: (select min(id) from entity where parent_id is null)

column.name: sql_query
column.value: select DISTINCT ON (user_id) user_id,id, total, balance, carried_balance, to_char(create_datetime, 'YYYY-MM-DD') as invoice_date from invoice order by user_id, create_datetime desc

column.name: functional_description
column.value: Query To Get Report On Customers’ last Invoices Details

column.name: parent_entity_id
column.valueComputed: (select min(id) from entity where parent_id is null)

column.name: sql_query
column.value: select purchase_order.user_id, base_user.entity_id, meta_field_value.string_value as asset, order_line.item_id as item_id, sum(order_line.quantity) as usage, sum(order_line.call_counter) as total_call from purchase_order inner join base_user on purchase_order.user_id=base_user.id inner join order_line on purchase_order.id = order_line.order_id inner join order_line_meta_field_map on order_line_meta_field_map.order_line_id=order_line.id inner join meta_field_value on meta_field_value.id= order_line_meta_field_map.meta_field_value_id where order_line.item_id in (:itemIdList) and purchase_order.deleted=0 group by purchase_order.user_id, base_user.entity_id,meta_field_value.string_value, item_id order by purchase_order.user_id,base_user.entity_id,meta_field_value.string_value

column.name: functional_description
column.value: Query To Get Customers Total Usages By Assets

column.name: parent_entity_id
column.valueComputed: (select min(id) from entity where parent_id is null)

column.name: sql_query
column.value: select payment.id as payment_id, amount, payment.result_id, payment.user_id, payment.payment_date, payment.create_datetime as createdate, payment.method_id,payment.is_refund, payment.payment_notes,meta_field_value.string_value as accountpin from payment inner join customer on customer.user_id=payment.user_id inner join customer_meta_field_map on customer_meta_field_map.customer_id=customer.id inner join meta_field_value on customer_meta_field_map.meta_field_value_id = meta_field_value.id where meta_field_value.meta_field_name_id in (select id from meta_field_name where LOWER(name) like '%account pin%') and payment.deleted=0 and payment.result_id not in (2, 3, 5) order by payment_id

column.valueComputed: (select min(id) from entity where parent_id is null)

changeSet.author: Harshad Pathan

changeSet.sql: INSERT INTO notification_message (entity_id, id, language_id, notify_admin, notify_all_parents, notify_parent, notify_partner, optlock, type_id, use_flag) select e1.id, (select max(p.id)+1 from notification_message p) + (select count(*) from entity e2 where e1.id > e2.id and e2.id <> e1.id), 1, 0, 0, 0, 0, 1,21, 1 from entity e1 order by e1.id
changeSet.comment: message_id = maxMessageId - count
changeSet.sql: INSERT INTO notification_message_section (id, message_id, section, optlock) select (select max(p.id)+1 from notification_message_section p) + (select count(*) from entity e2 where e1.id > e2.id and e2.id <> e1.id), (select max(p.id) from notification_message p) - (select count(*) from entity e2 where e1.id > e2.id and e2.id <> e1.id), 1, 1 from entity e1 order by e1.id
changeSet.comment: message_id = maxMessageId - count
changeSet.sql: INSERT INTO notification_message_section (id, message_id, section, optlock) select (select max(p.id)+1 from notification_message_section p) + (select count(*) from entity e2 where e1.id > e2.id and e2.id <> e1.id), (select max(p.id) from notification_message p) - (select count(*) from entity e2 where e1.id > e2.id and e2.id <> e1.id), 2, 1 from entity e1 order by e1.id

INSERT INTO notification_message_section (id, message_id, section, optlock) select (select max(p.id)+1 from notification_message_section p) + (select count(*) from entity e2 where e1.id > e2.id and e2.id <> e1.id), (select max(p.id) from notification_message p) - (select count(*) from entity e2 where e1.id > e2.id and e2.id <> e1.id), 2, 1 from entity e1 order by e1.id
changeSet.comment: message_section_id = (maxSectionId + 1 - (3 * entityCant)) + count
changeSet.sql: INSERT INTO notification_message_line (id, message_section_id, content, optlock) select (select max(p.id)+1 from notification_message_line p) + (select count(*) from entity e2 where e1.id > e2.id and e2.id <> e1.id), (select max(p.id)+1 from notification_message_section p) - (select count(*) * 3 from entity ecant) + (select count(*) from entity e2 where e1.id > e2.id and e2.id <> e1.id), 'Initial Credentials', 1 from entity e1 order by e1.id
changeSet.comment: message_section_id = (maxSectionId + 1 - (1 * entityCant)) + count
changeSet.sql: INSERT INTO notification_message_line (id, message_section_id, content, optlock) select (select max(p.id)+1 from notification_message_line p) + (select count(*) from entity e2 where e1.id > e2.id and e2.id <> e1.id), (select max(p.id)+1 from notification_message_section p) - (select count(*) * 1 from entity ecant) + (select count(*) from entity e2 where e1.id > e2.id and e2.id <> e1.id), 'Hello $first_name $last_name, Welcome to jBilling!. Please follow this link to set your credentials for company $company_name ($company_id): $newPasswordLink', 1 from entity e1 order by e1.id

changeSet.id: Set preference value for allowing duplicate metafields in copy company
changeSet.author: Neelabh Dubey
changeSet.comment: Update preference 83 to avoid duplicate values while upgrading FC DB
changeSet.sql: insert into preference(id, type_id, table_id, foreign_id, value) select (select case count(t.id) when 0 then 1 ELSE max(t.id) + 1 END from preference t) + (select count(*) from entity e2 where e1.id > e2.id and e2.id <> e1.id), 83, 5, e1.id, '1' from entity e1 order by e1.id

changeSet.id: Update preference value for not allowing duplicate metafields in copy company
changeSet.author: Neelabh Dubey
changeSet.comment: Delete preference 83 to avoid duplicate values in prepare-test DB.
changeSet.sql: insert into preference(id, type_id, table_id, foreign_id, value) select (select case count(t.id) when 0 then 1 ELSE max(t.id) + 1 END from preference t) + (select count(*) from entity e2 where e1.id > e2.id and e2.id <> e1.id), 83, 5, e1.id, '0' from entity e1 order by e1.id

changeSet.id: JBFC-504 Migrate and delete meta field values data
changeSet.author: Ashok Kale
changeSet.comment: Migrate meta field values of order line into new column call identifier. Create backup tables from meta_field_value and meta_field_name. Delete meta field value and name data after migration.
changeSet.sql: UPDATE order_line as ol set call_identifier = mfv.string_value FROM order_line_meta_field_map olm, meta_field_value mfv WHERE ol.id = olm.order_line_id AND olm.meta_field_value_id = mfv.id;
